paragraphs.title: Hook Local Package Files to Path

paragraphs.text:
%python
from twitter_client import get_twitter_client
import json
client = get_twitter_client()
profile = client.get_user(screen_name="PacktPub")
print(json.dumps(profile._json, indent =4))

paragraphs.text:
%spark
import org.apache.spark.streaming._
import org.apache.spark.streaming.twitter._
//import org.apache.bahir.spark.streaming.twitter._
import org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel
import scala.io.Source
import scala.collection.mutable.HashMap
import java.io.File
import org.apache.log4j.Logger
import org.apache.log4j.Level
import sys.process.stringSeqToProcess
import twitter4j.HashtagEntity

val consumerKey = System.getenv("TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY")
val consumerSecret = System.getenv("TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET")
val accessToken = System.getenv("TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN")
val accessTokenSecret = System.getenv("TWITTER_ACCESS_SECRET")

System.setProperty("twitter4j.oauth.consumerKey", consumerKey)
System.setProperty("twitter4j.oauth.consumerSecret", consumerSecret)
System.setProperty("twitter4j.oauth.accessToken", accessToken)
System.setProperty("twitter4j.oauth.accessTokenSecret", accessTokenSecret)
